name: TowerFell
description:
This is my second entry for the LowRezJam2020. It has taken me 7 days. I consider that I have created a challenging game, the game consists of falling from a tower and getting as low as possible, the tower is 1KM high. can you get to the ground?

Controls:

WASD = Movement

Mouse = Point

Click = Shoot

Spacebar = Dodge (Dodge successfully reloads a knife)
